I noticed in a crawl log that when I have Tom's text/html midfetch
filter set up that robots.txt triggers it (which makes sense as it's a
text/plain), but I'm guessing that heritrix has already processed the
file for what it needs rules-wise, correct?

Just wanted to make sure that it wasn't somehow circumventing
robots.txt and I'd end up crawling sites that didn't want to be crawled.

Thanks,
Rob.
